ENGLISH: Oh...\| flowers. How nice.\! You really are a hopeless romantic.\! And I do emphasize hopeless.
ZH-cn: 哦……\|鲜花。费心了啊。\!你真是个无可救药的浪漫主义者。\!我是说，无，可，救，药。

ENGLISH: You wound me, my dear.\! You wound me with your blade-edged words...
ZH-cn: 亲爱的，你伤害了我。\!你用你尖锐的话语伤害了我……

ENGLISH: So sorry.\! You may want to see a priestess.
ZH-cn: 真抱歉。\!你可能需要让女祭司来给治一下。

ENGLISH: All I need is the warmth of your radiant beauty by my side.\! Admit it, how can you look at these baby blues and remain so defiant?
ZH-cn: 我只需你光芒四射的美貌在我身边洒下的无尽温暖。\!承认吧，你怎么可能在这些婴儿蓝色花朵的攻势下依旧不为所动？

ENGLISH: You would do quite well if those 'baby blues' did the talking, and not your foul mouth.
ZH-cn: 要是说话的是这些婴儿蓝色的花那可能确实会有用，但现实是开口的是你这张臭嘴

ENGLISH: ....A compliment?\! From the icy heart that struggles to beat beneath this breathtaking visage I see before me?\! I can now die a happy man...
ZH-cn: ……这是在夸我吗？\!这个冷若冰雕，内心一片死寂，却又美得惊心动魄的存在居然在当面夸我吗？\!我现在死也可以做个开心鬼了……
啊，请务必这么做。快去死。

ENGLISH: But your heart would be shattered beyond repair for the rest of your days.
ZH-cn: 可这样一来你的余生就会在心碎中度过。

ENGLISH: Dream\| on!!!\! Ugh, when are you going to get a clue?!\! You are a pig and I do not like you!
ZH-cn: 做你的\|大梦去吧！！！\!喂，你到底什么时候才能明白现实啊？！\!你是头猪而我不喜欢你！

ENGLISH: You'd better hope for a miracle then, thief.
ZH-cn: 你最好试着看看奇迹会不会出现，蠢贼。

ENGLISH: We do live in strange times, m'lady!\! Keep believing and it may just come true!
ZH-cn: 我们确实生活在一个离奇的时代，我的女士！\!不过，念念不忘必有回响！

ENGLISH: Ugh, no, YOU are the one who wants...\| Nevermind.\! I am going away now!\! If you follow me, I will put an arrow through your eye socket!
ZH-cn: 呃，等下，明明是你这个家伙要……\|罢了。\!我得走了！\!如果你敢跟着，我就把箭钉在你的眼眶上！

ENGLISH: A blessed day to you, fair Narima.\! You know where to find me.
ZH-cn: 祝你拥有美好的一天，美丽的娜瑞玛。\!你知道能在哪儿找到我的。
